# arrayLength

**Instance Property**

The number of items in the texture array.

## Declaration

```swift
var arrayLength: UInt64 { get }
```

## Discussion

Array-based texture types such as [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureType/type2DArray] manage one or more images of the same size. The array length represents the number of separate images the texture manages. Other array types store only one image.

## Getting the layer’s texture topology

- **textureType**: The texture type value that specifies how the underlying texture organizes its views.
